[[div class="blockquote"]]

++++ Who am I?

I started writing SCP stuff in 2021 in a tiny closet, and now it's become my biggest special interest. 

I write psychological fiction, mostly of a bleak and hopeless nature. Psychological horror is what drew me to SCP, and I am inspired by it, and want to emulate some of that.

My writing focuses on abuse and trauma, but I also like themes of healing, redemption, and forgiveness. You might see the progression of one to another as I post more of my rewrite.

Do be warned, if you're somehow encountering this page before its writing, that I seriously mean my content warnings. If it's enough for the Adult splash page, it's enough that it must be really graphic, not just a little mention or vague depiction. 

Other informations about me: I'm Catholic, speak french and japanese and mainly learned english from looking at my SpInts on the internet, listen to a semi-pathological amount of music, after I hug God and Mama Mary in Heaven (Lord willing) I'll immediately glomp St. Francis, and am paraplegic with a smattering of other illnesses plus mental disabilities which make writing extremely difficult but I do it anyways.

**Topics I specialise in critting:** schizophrenia, schizoid personality disorder, borderline personality disorder, self-harm, suicide/suicide attempts, psychiatry/psych wards/antipsychotics, ASD at higher support levels, physical disabilities, mobility aids (especially wheelchairs), medical accuracy for all kinds of things/procedures, theological accuracy for Catholicism in particular. 

If you need help writing any of the above, from idea feedback to draft feedback to sensitivity reading, I can do that. PM me here, ping me in your thread in the SCPF server, or DM me on Discord (@tiredsn0w), whatever works for you. If I don't respond for a while it's because of health issues, though if I seem to have accidentally ghosted you feel free to send another message.

P.S. I am a rambler/waffler and can have stilted speech at times. Sorry for any communication inconvenience.

[[/div]]
